DOC.brief_summary: The objective study follow : 1 ) confirm administration grape juice , resveratrol , grape seed polyphenol extract result similar plasma urinary metabolic profile age human compare rat , 2 ) confirm combine administration grape juice , resveratrol , grape seed polyphenol extract result similar plasma urinary metabolic profile adult tendencies toward metabolic syndrome compare non-obese healthy human , 3 ) identify anti-inflammatory effect combine administration grape juice , resveratrol , grape seed polyphenol extract .
DOC.criteria: Age < 60 year begin study Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dl Blood pressure > 160/100 Fasting total blood cholesterol > 280 mg/dl Fasting triglycerides > 300 mg/dl Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , hyperthyroidism , untreated unstable hypothyroidism , certain cancer , gastrointestinal disease , pancreatic disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome Presence type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin History bariatric certain surgery relate weight control Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) Consumption 3 serving tea , wine , grape juice per day Use supplement contain grape extract product Use antibiotic intervention 3 week prior intervention period History eating disorder , dietary pattern , supplement use interfere goal intervention Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 4 month Volunteers unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Volunteers selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
